name: Verloren: Starcrossed
description:
In Space, no one can hear you cry... or something like that.

You've been chosen as a replacement Mechanic for the Orion. A starship engaging in a diplomatic mission to the Akeh Space Station in the Canis Major System. All was going well, you entered cryo sleep in a backup cryo chamber and waited for your designated shift. Sure, it was going to take a few years but there were reasons you left Earth.

Only... you've been awakened by a warning and there doesn't seem to be anyone aboard other than these strange aliens who look nothing like the ones you're supposed to meet at Akeh. And they all want something from you.

---------------------

Verloren: Starcrossed is a VN inspired by various sci-fi shows and movies but mostly from Farscape, Pandorum and Lost in Space.

There will be multiple endings to experience. 

Sci-fi Music Pack [Copyright](C) Joel Steudler
Android Dreams
Stardust Memory
Memories of Home

Futuristic Atmospheres [Copyright](C) 2013 Joel Steudler
Nebula Cloud

------

Current Build is a 5-ish minutes demo.
